name: Rain (itch) (e-LEMON-ators)
description:
Install instructions

This is a game where you face Infinite challenge with randomized level !

Game Controllers :

  • Up
  • Left
  • Right
  • Down

Game Features:

  • Random Map Creation !
  • Speed Run !
  • Puzzle !

Game Mechanics:

  • Don't get caught by ghost !
  • Don't run put of score point !
  • Find the path to another room !
  • Repeat!
